key.name: id
key.label: Name
key.hint: Bitte w√§hlen Sie einen eindeutigen Namen

key.name: id
key.label: Id
key.hint: Please choose a unique name for this item

key.name: resource
key.label: Resource
key.hint: The resource element provides the URI of the link, overriding the resource attribute of its parent control (load / submission). The URI to be used by the parent control can be specified with either the value attribute or the string content of the resource element. If both are specified, then the value attribute takes precedence.

key.name: valueAttribute
key.label: Value
key.hint: Author-optional attribute containing an XPath expression to evaluate using the in-scope evaluation context. To obtain the event delay, the result of the expression is processed as if by call to the XPath string function. If the result does not conform lexically to xsd:nonNegativeInteger, then the result of empty string is used. An empty string is used if the XPath evaluation fails.
